website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Saucony Excursion TR 13 has amazed the majority of the buyers, as reflected in the positive feedback and reviews. As it outweighs the negative comments, almost all of them were made happy and contented. Many considered that their purchase of the Saucony Excursion TR 13 is an excellent choice because of its comfort level, amazing fit, and fantastic design. Together with the structure is the high-level performance it provides to the users. Though one of the testers mentioned an issue with its durability, others still believe that the shoe is a worthy purchase, especially for those who want to improve their performance on the trails.
pros: The majority of the users commented that the Saucony Excursion TR 13 is comfortable
Some of the testers agreed that the shoe is supportive
A significant number of buyers said that the running shoe has excellent features and technologies integrated into it
Many purchasers loved its fantastic fit
A few consumers noted that the shoe is stylish
They appreciated its look and colorways
Based on some reviews, the shoe has a roomy toe box
According to those who have bought it, the shoe has an affordable price
A lot of users claimed that the Saucony Excursion TR 13 is great for hiking and running activities
cons: One of the purchasers said that the shoe is not durable
He had the shoe for two weeks only, and the cushioning around the ankle is already fraying
He claimed that this has never happened on any of his other shoes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely tight toebox!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my normal size, 10.5, and though the shoes arrived in good shape and in good time, they were ridiculously tight through the toes and ball of my foot. I haven't worn Saucony shoes before, so this may well be their standard style fit, but I don't consider myself to have a wide foot and these were super teeny! Your mileage may vary, of course.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible extremely poorly made would not recommend I purchase the same shoes in the store after returning these and let me tell you the quality difference was unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Dispatcher209

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement pair for my TR11 series, which I wore out in 6 months playing a lot of Pickleball. These were a great replacement pair and after a couple of walking outings, were broke in perfectly. They are lightweight but sturdy and I’m looking forward to another great season of Pickleball with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty R. Belleville

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn some kind of Saucony trail running shoe for the past 12 years and have always loved them. When I unboxed these, I thought they looked like something I’d get from Walmart. They even felt like a cheap pair of shoes. I tried then on and instantly knew I wouldn’t keep them. There was nothing over the top about them and definitely nothing about them that justified the price. Maybe $40, but no more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The odd Excursion TR that did not work for me (usually my go-to shoe)
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of $50-100 Saucony Excursion Tr shoes from the last few years. I almost always love them (however sometimes the GTX versions are sized a bit off, and a pair of Tr12 are a bit less supple than I like). These were terrible. Very hard soles; not forgiving. The left shoe had an extra hard part on the right side just before the heel that felt like a misplaced rock guard/shank. There was also a sewing mistake under the removable foot bed that made this pair even worse. I will not give up on the model because I generally really like the fit and durability of most Excursions I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fits perfect , great tread. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Diane cynova

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Sauconys for over 40 years. These are just okay, but not great. They are not as comfortable, to me, as the Cohesion or Marauder trainers. Looking at them, except for styling and the tread pattern, it is hard to discern much difference: the in-sole and mid-sole seem to be the same; but I find that my feet will hurt when walking in these much quicker and more than when wearing my other Sauconys.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, I am on my feet 9 hours a day with little to no discomfort from these shoes. The water resistance works well, keeps my feet dry when I am out in the snow for short periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: flybynht

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog 2-3 miles, twice per day. Between that, exercise and daily wear, I can wear the tread smooth in just a few months. These are specifically for road running, and seem to have a very durable sole (so far). If they hold up as well as I hop thy will, I will definitely be ordering another pair when these finally give up the ghost. They are very comfortable and support my foot well at the arch and along the outer edge which, to me, is the key to a great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little wide, but it's still my go-to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kamokasie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these Shoes because they are waterproof they are rugged and very comfortable to wear perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: James Munson

customer_reviews.title: Saucony rules
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 12 1/2 and had to exchange for a 13. I own them in women’s sizes they are fantastic for cross training trail running and I walked the Jimmy fund in them 26.2 miles. Did not have one blister.
customer_reviews.author: MARYANNE M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: The only running shoes my family will wear. These are also great for hiking because they are so lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Dress code at work is business casual and with my back I cannot wear dress shoes. So I wear tennis shoes instead but finding a tennis shoe where the color doesn't stand out can be challenging but this fit that need for me. I ordered 1 black pair and then order a second blue pair after wearing the first pair for a few weeks. Great price, light weight, comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Camp

customer_reviews.title: Good all around pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of these. I bought a pair a year ago and liked them so much that when I saw them on sale I bought three pairs. Fits true to size, at least for me (I wear an 11). Even at full price, they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Just Enough

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT&COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT! ONE thing that I have noticed is that they dont last long in daily use.But I pay attention to my feet.I have purchased these from the Starting line.I will keep on buying them because they feel great on the FEET!!!
customer_reviews.author: craig snowberger

customer_reviews.title: Back to a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I wear the TR's as an everyday shoe.Have bought Saucony for over a decade and suddenly a few years back the shoe became MUCH narrower...especially in the toe box.Someone finally got the memo. These shoes have returned to their past customary comfortable fit.Now....do the same for ur running shoes please
customer_reviews.author: KM in PA

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My son got a pair of Saucony shoes 1.5 years ago and they lasted all that time and he'll continue to wear them for play/ mowing... but he was due for a fresh pair for daily nice wear. This pair came today, and as we expected fit perfectly. We hope they last as long as the last pair did. We love this brand for him.
customer_reviews.author: Stina V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was the feel of the waffle grid in the soles. They feel like $5 Walmart sneakers! (tennis shoes) They are very slippery on wet roads, rocks, etc. I'll never buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul L Oostdyk

customer_reviews.title: They run a size too small.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that they were too small. It was a bit of a hassle having to go to a UPS store to return them. I've used Kohl's in the past for returns. The Kohl's store is much more convienint for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for winter running. Sizes run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: These take a while to break in and the sizes run a little big, but they are a decent weather resistant running shoe. I wish that I had ordered half a size smaller than what I normally wear. Even wearing wool winter socks I wish they fit more snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Somehow less cushion than versions with literally less cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the standard version of this show and loved it. Thought these would provide more cushion, but sadly they do not. In fact they provide less. I do not know how these were made, but I believe it was with light weight concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Burton Norris Fulton III

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great price for GoreTex!!!! Best winter outdoor running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: GST

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight. I use them for my morning walk....eminently recommendable shoe. Had to order full size larger than my regular size. Still, quite pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: hommedumonde

customer_reviews.title: shady shoe seller
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting Saucony for me yet...I bought 2 pairs. they both fell apart in the same place! the fabric must be bad... of course it falls apart after rhe return deadline..shady
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable rain walking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable for daily walking, and they ARE waterproof for walking in the rain. They do breathe well even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Silvestri

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. They are nice. They fit well, are holding up well (and he's hard on shoes).... and were a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seem really stiff still even after a couple months of active daily use. I immediately needed to use insoles because the ones that come with it had almost no support.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Huxtable

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great tread pattern
customer_reviews.text: The Saucony Excursions arrived and performed as expected. The shoes are relatively light for the design and tread pattern. There is little to no break in period. If you have had previously versions of this shoe this version will not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: My favorite daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is like the 7th pair of Saucony shoes I have purchased. These fit great out of the box. Many other brands hurt my feet tremendously or are just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs true to size for me. I need a wide toe box and this fulfills the need there. Very comfortable and light. I've already put 40 miles on them and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are well beyond their "break-in" period and still just aren't very comfortable. Definitely not a great running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G

customer_reviews.title: Another solid TR from Saucony
customer_reviews.text: Yet again a solid TR from Saucony. From what I can tell its sort of a visual return to the TR7/TR8 which I really liked. Saucony TR's have been the most comfortable shoes I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Kime

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with comfort of the product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this item to home the trails and every day use. Very comfortable, so comfortable that I don't have to use my orthopedic insoles. Only issue I had which was not a manufacture problem it was an Amazon issue was that my box was delivered in a bag and the shoe box was crushed and torn. Luckily my shoes were not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: John Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: The insole was thin. Can feel ridges from the sole. Although still mostly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Insurancelaw

customer_reviews.title: great but weird
customer_reviews.text: theres a weird extra cushion near the heals - the arch support curve goes all the way back to the heals
customer_reviews.author: attilakb

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Saucony shoes for years without any problems but this shoe was a letdown. I bought the same shoe for my mom and I and we both have weird fraying on sides of the opening of the shoe where your foot goes in. We go for short walks once a day so it's not like there has been serious wear on our shoes either. I've never had a shoe wear down this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Saucony for decades. Will never guy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Catseye

customer_reviews.title: Ran a size smaller than listed
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than my excursions t12 of the same size. At least a size smaller, unfortunately I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than NB
customer_reviews.text: Spend an extra few dollars and your feet and back will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Adorno

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend adores his Saucony's. Great fit, wears well, and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great for cycling in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Road my bike through 2 heavy rain falls and a few drizzly storms and they kept my feet dry wearing ankle socks. Just a little water damped the edge of my ankle but nothing to complain about. The bottoms handled running down metal subway stairs well. Overall they seem really durable after only about a week of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Eclipse

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am not a runner. I lift weights and hike a lot. Wanted a lighter shoe to walk my dog and hike. Comfortable and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: DIAMONDOUG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Brand tends to run a little small. We ordered a half size bigger and they fit perfect. Love Saucony!
customer_reviews.author: doneil

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: there nice looking shoes , seriously amazon their shoes for my feet
customer_reviews.author: gaeaskin candies

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at a great price Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bf who loves them. Says they're very comfortable. Great value. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are well-made and comfortable. The arch support is good too. The only negative aspect is that the soles wear out quicker than in other sneakers I buy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are light and comfortable with good support. Plan on buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wide feet, and Saucony shoes fit me better than most other brands. Good price point as well for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: watch guy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he finds them very comfortable. Cushioned soles and not to heavy. We got the navy and they are a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good shoe but not as confortable as my Reebok zig zag .
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable, good fitting, and nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Estel Love

customer_reviews.title: toe box was tight compared to the Saucony Ride-10s I had before
customer_reviews.text: I can't wear thorlos comfortably in these shoes. Going to have to go up a half-size next time.
customer_reviews.author: EdS

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfy and I can’t wait to try just how waterproof they are.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits different I bought size 12 but the left shoe feels smaller than the right shoe. Try on in store don’t order online
customer_reviews.author: Slim da Mobsta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe right out of the box! I work evenings in a large warehouse with concrete floors and these shoes have been very comfortable. My feet are so much better and that has helped my knees, hips and back since I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus V Fitzjarrell

customer_reviews.title: Saucony fit varies between models - these are uncomfortably tighter
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Saucony shoes, so felt confident in ordering another pair in different style. These are uncomfortably smaller in the toe than the other styles I have.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: lasted 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: They lasted 2 days and the right shoe started to fall apart. Iv had this brand in the past and never had this issue. the quality of product has dropped. ill be looking for a new brand to use.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, very comfortable shoe. I walk miles each day at work and these shoes leave my feet feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: kats

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, quality, value
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out the box! Second pair I’ve owned. Wore out the soles on my last pair. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: if it was non slip theyd be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, waterproof, a bit garish but the price for comfort
customer_reviews.author: james ashby

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have always wore Saucony but these were too tight at my little toe so had to return. Bummer because my previous Excursions last 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Comfortable and light weight. But, fit is smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: David Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little bit higher from this seller than should be, but the shoes are really nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order next size up
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought same shoe same size at Dsw. Always 9. These are like 8’s with label of 9
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of Versafoam
customer_reviews.text: Least comfortable Saucony I have ever bought. What happened to the famous Saucony cushioning? No more Versafoam for me.
customer_reviews.author: ken harper

customer_reviews.title: Solid Saucony product
customer_reviews.text: Using these as a cross trainer at the gym; solid support and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyD

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: on my feet a lot of the day at work, most comfortable shoes I have ever had. Will continue to only wear this brand.
customer_reviews.author: William Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: best most comfortable walking / running shoe I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable with great support
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product. It is a great shoe for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Timmins

customer_reviews.title: Saucony sweet
customer_reviews.text: They are magnificent, very comfortable & sturdy. I’m enjoying them very much
customer_reviews.author: RaRa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband who's super hard to get comfortable shoes. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and fitting is right on.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing saucony for years. I like hiking and running and I have trust these shoes more than any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Great product for running and walking.
customer_reviews.text: Saucony makes great shoes. Light and durable. Very satisfied with this product as I am with all the shoes I have bought from saucony.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Happy as usually with Saucony. Good quality for the Price.
customer_reviews.author: Friedrich Sajovitz

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for working on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Saucony jazz are easier to break in, however a very nice shoe here
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hamill

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping is my first time with saukoni I have to get use after 15 years with new balance 990
customer_reviews.author: naftaly

customer_reviews.title: It's a good item
customer_reviews.text: excellent trail shoe light and with good grip on the road and good cushioning on dirt
customer_reviews.author: pasquale

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Excursion Tr 13 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Saucony® Versafoam Excursion TR13 trail running shoe delivers the proper cushioning, rugged traction, durability, and protection needed for any trail you choose to trek. Predecessor: Excursion TR12. Pronation: Neutral. Cushioning: Moderate. Surface: Trail. Heel Stack Height: 25.5mm. Forefoot Stack Height: 17.5mm. Offset: 8mm. Trail-specific knit mesh upper with supportive overlays that lock the foot into place and protect against debris. Sock-like padded collar and tongue. Lace-up closure. Pull tab at heel for easy on and off. Heel Grid system offers stable cushioning for a smooth ride. VERSAFOAM midsole technology delivers increased cushioning for ultimate comfort and a responsive feel for every step. XT-900 premium carbon rubber outsole offers enhanced traction and long-lasting wear. Triangular-shaped lugs provide rock-solid footing and increased grip over the terrain. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Versafoam cushioning for more comfort than ever before
A cushy stack of Versafoam cushioning feels responsive to provide every level of runner comfortable strides
The triangular-lugged outsole grips the terrain for rock-solid footing
The trail-specific mesh with supportive overlays locks your foot into place and protects from trail debris
